meanings.definition: A carbohydrate composed of two monosaccharides.
meanings.sent2: I learned about disaccharides in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The disaccharides threw a party for the monosaccharides.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as disaccharides.
meanings.sent5: The disaccharides danced together in perfect harmony.

meanings.definition: Sugars that consist of two monosaccharide molecules joined together.
meanings.sent1: We consume disaccharides in many foods.
meanings.sent2: The body breaks down disaccharides into simpler sugars.
meanings.sent3: The disaccharides held hands and formed a chain.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as disaccharides.
meanings.sent5: The disaccharides sparkled like gems under the microscope.
